meta.name: face_analyzer_trait_catalog
meta.description: Comprehensive trait catalog for facial aesthetics analysis with honest scoring

side_missing.note: These traits require side view for accurate assessment

trait_catalog.name: Overall Facial Harmony
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Composite score from proportion deviations. Penalize large deviations from reference ratios.

trait_catalog.name: Vertical Symmetry
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Average symmetry deltas. Perfect symmetry is rare; minor asymmetry is normal.

trait_catalog.name: Facial Thirds Balance
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Compare each third to ideal 33%. Hairline detection unreliable.

trait_catalog.name: Facial Fifths Balance
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Each fifth should approximate eye width. Deviation scoring.

trait_catalog.name: Golden Ratio Proximity
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Calculate deviation from phi (1.618) for key ratios.

trait_catalog.name: Facial Profile Convexity
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Measure profile angle. Only score if quality side view provided.
notes: Omit or low confidence without side

trait_catalog.name: Face Shape Classification
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Classify into oval/round/square/heart/diamond/oblong. Output class not score.

trait_catalog.name: Face Width-to-Height Ratio
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Ideal range 0.62-0.72. Penalize extremes.

trait_catalog.name: Face Tapering
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Measure width gradient from cheeks to chin.

trait_catalog.name: Forehead Height
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Should be approximately 1/3 of face. Hair affects measurement.
notes: Very unreliable due to hairline detection

trait_catalog.name: Forehead Width
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Compare to face width at cheeks.

trait_catalog.name: Hairline Shape
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Classify as straight/widows_peak/rounded/m_shaped/receding.

trait_catalog.name: Temple Hair Fullness
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Assess hair density at temples. Lighting dependent.

trait_catalog.name: Forehead Skin Texture
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Assess smoothness. Lighting heavily influences. No diagnosis.

trait_catalog.name: Brow Shape
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Classify arch type. Score based on balance and definition.

trait_catalog.name: Brow Thickness
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Assess fullness. No universal ideal; proportional matters.

trait_catalog.name: Brow Symmetry
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Compare left vs right. Expression affects.

trait_catalog.name: Brow Vertical Position
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Assess height relative to eyes. Affects perceived openness.

trait_catalog.name: Brow Tail Position
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Tail should end at or beyond outer eye corner.

trait_catalog.name: Inter-Brow Spacing
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Should approximate one eye width.

trait_catalog.name: Brow Grooming Quality
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Assess maintenance level. Stray hairs, shape definition.

trait_catalog.name: Brow Arch Definition
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Assess clarity of arch peak.

trait_catalog.name: Eye Shape
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Classify as almond/round/hooded/monolid/downturned/upturned.

trait_catalog.name: Eye Size
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Relative to face size. No universal ideal.

trait_catalog.name: Eye Spacing (Intercanthal)
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Ideal ratio 0.28-0.35 of IPD. Highly reliable measurement.

trait_catalog.name: Canthal Tilt
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Positive tilt generally preferred. 4-8 degrees ideal range.

trait_catalog.name: Upper Eyelid Exposure
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Varies by ethnicity. No universal ideal.

trait_catalog.name: Eye Symmetry
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Minor asymmetry normal and adds character.

trait_catalog.name: Under-Eye Area Appearance
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Assess darkness, puffiness. Lighting heavily affects.

trait_catalog.name: Under-Eye Darkness
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Assess darkness level. Lighting dependent.

trait_catalog.name: Under-Eye Puffiness
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Assess swelling. Can be temporary.

trait_catalog.name: Limbal Ring/Eye Contrast
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Assess limbal ring clarity. Photo quality heavily affects.

trait_catalog.name: Scleral Show
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Minimal show typically preferred. Expression affects.

trait_catalog.name: Orbital Rim Support
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Bone structure assessment. Difficult from photos.

trait_catalog.name: Periorbital Hollowing
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Assess depth around eye socket. Lighting creates shadows.

trait_catalog.name: Eye Prominence
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: How far eyes project. Requires side view.
notes: Side view needed for accurate assessment

trait_catalog.name: Nose Length
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Should approximate middle third height.
notes: Proportional to face matters more than absolute

trait_catalog.name: Nose Width (Alar)
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Ideal approximately equals eye width. Ratio 0.22-0.30.

trait_catalog.name: Nose Bridge Width
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Assess width at bridge level.

trait_catalog.name: Nose Bridge Definition
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Assess clarity of bridge lines.

trait_catalog.name: Nose Tip Shape
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Assess definition and shape of nasal tip.

trait_catalog.name: Nose Tip Rotation
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Measure angle at base. Requires side view.
notes: Side view required for accurate measurement

trait_catalog.name: Nose Symmetry
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Assess deviation from midline. Head tilt sensitive.

trait_catalog.name: Nose Projection
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: How far nose projects from face. Side view required.

trait_catalog.name: Nasal Profile Shape
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Classify as straight/convex/concave. Side view only.

trait_catalog.name: Nostril Shape
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Assess shape and visibility from front.

trait_catalog.name: Nostril Symmetry
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Compare left vs right nostril.

trait_catalog.name: Columella Show
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Visibility of columella from front.

trait_catalog.name: Cheekbone Prominence
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Assess projection and visibility. Lighting heavily affects.

trait_catalog.name: Cheekbone Width
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Measure at widest point. Contributes to face shape.

trait_catalog.name: Cheekbone Position
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Vertical position of cheekbone apex.

trait_catalog.name: Midface Ratio
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Midface as proportion of total face. Ideal 0.30-0.36.

trait_catalog.name: Cheek Fullness
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Assess soft tissue volume. Body composition affects.

trait_catalog.name: Nasolabial Fold Visibility
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Assess depth of smile lines. Expression and lighting affect.

trait_catalog.name: Midface Support
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Overall structural support assessment.

trait_catalog.name: Lip Fullness
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Assess volume. No universal ideal; proportional matters.

trait_catalog.name: Upper-to-Lower Lip Ratio
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Ideal around 1:1.6 but variable by preference.

trait_catalog.name: Lip Border Definition
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Assess vermillion border clarity and cupids bow.

trait_catalog.name: Cupid's Bow Definition
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Assess clarity of cupids bow peaks.

trait_catalog.name: Mouth Width
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Should align roughly with pupils. Ratio 0.38-0.50.

trait_catalog.name: Lip Symmetry
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Compare left vs right sides.

trait_catalog.name: Philtrum Length
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Shorter philtrum often preferred but variable.

trait_catalog.name: Philtrum Definition
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Assess clarity of philtrum ridges.

trait_catalog.name: Lip Color/Health
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Assess natural color and hydration appearance.

trait_catalog.name: Mouth Corner Position
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Neutral or slight upturn preferred.

trait_catalog.name: Vermillion Show
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Amount of red lip visible.

trait_catalog.name: Jaw Width
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Measure at gonial angles. Body composition affects.

trait_catalog.name: Jaw Definition
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Assess sharpness of jawline. Lighting, posture, body fat all affect.

trait_catalog.name: Gonial Angle
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Ideal 110-130 degrees. Requires side view.

trait_catalog.name: Jaw Symmetry
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Compare left vs right jaw width.

trait_catalog.name: Jaw Taper
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: How jaw narrows toward chin.

trait_catalog.name: Chin Shape
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Classify as pointed/rounded/square/cleft.

trait_catalog.name: Chin Projection
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Forward projection from face. Side view required.

trait_catalog.name: Chin Height
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Vertical height of chin region.

trait_catalog.name: Chin Symmetry
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Assess chin center alignment.

trait_catalog.name: Submental Area
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Area under chin to neck. Posture and body comp affect.

trait_catalog.name: Cervicomental Angle
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Angle between chin and neck. 105-120 ideal. Side view required.

trait_catalog.name: Apparent Neck Length
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Visual length of neck. Posture affects greatly.

trait_catalog.name: Head/Neck Posture
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Forward head position assessment. Side view helps.

trait_catalog.name: Skin Texture
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Assess smoothness and pore visibility. Lighting heavily affects.

trait_catalog.name: Skin Tone Evenness
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Assess color uniformity. Lighting affects perception.

trait_catalog.name: Skin Clarity
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Absence of visible concerns. Photo quality affects.

trait_catalog.name: Skin Hydration Appearance
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: How hydrated skin appears. Difficult to assess from photo.

trait_catalog.name: Skin Radiance/Glow
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Natural luminosity. Lighting heavily influences.

trait_catalog.name: Skin Overall Impression
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Composite skin assessment. Conservative scoring.

trait_catalog.name: Hair Health Appearance
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Shine, texture, condition assessment.

trait_catalog.name: Hair Density
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Fullness and thickness appearance.

trait_catalog.name: Hairstyle Face Fit
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: How well current style complements face shape.

trait_catalog.name: Hair Face Framing
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: How hair frames and flatters face.

trait_catalog.name: Hair-Skin Color Harmony
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: How well hair color complements skin tone.

trait_catalog.name: Hair Volume
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Assess volume relative to face proportions.

trait_catalog.name: Hair Texture Quality
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Smoothness and consistency of texture.

trait_catalog.name: Facial Hair Presence
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Detect if facial hair present. Binary detection.

trait_catalog.name: Facial Hair Grooming
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Maintenance quality if facial hair present.
notes: Only score if facial hair detected

trait_catalog.name: Facial Hair Style Fit
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: How well facial hair style suits face shape.
notes: Only score if facial hair detected

trait_catalog.name: Smile Appeal
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Overall smile attractiveness. Only if smiling in photo.

trait_catalog.name: Teeth Show in Smile
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Amount of teeth visible when smiling.

trait_catalog.name: Gum Show
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Gum visibility when smiling. Minimal preferred.

trait_catalog.name: Teeth Alignment
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Straightness of visible teeth.

trait_catalog.name: Teeth Color
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Assess apparent whiteness. Photo color affects.

trait_catalog.name: Smile Symmetry
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Left-right balance when smiling.

trait_catalog.name: Photo Angle Quality
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: How flattering the photo angle is.

trait_catalog.name: Lighting Quality
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: How well lighting presents face.

trait_catalog.name: Camera Distance Effect
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Lens distortion assessment. Close selfies distort.

trait_catalog.name: Expression Appeal
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: How attractive the expression appears.

trait_catalog.name: Posture in Photo
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: How posture affects facial presentation.

trait_catalog.name: Eye Openness
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: How open and alert eyes appear. Expression affects.

trait_catalog.name: Eye Set Depth
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: How deep-set or prominent eyes are. Side view helps.

trait_catalog.name: Eyelash Prominence
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Visibility and fullness of eyelashes.

trait_catalog.name: Brow Bone Prominence
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Projection of supraorbital ridge. Side view required.

trait_catalog.name: Nasal Dorsum Definition
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Clarity and straightness of nose ridge.

trait_catalog.name: Alar Base Width
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Width at nostril base. Reliable measurement.

trait_catalog.name: Nasal Tip Definition
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Sharpness and refinement of tip.

trait_catalog.name: Lip Protrusion
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Forward projection of lips. Side view required.

trait_catalog.name: Mentolabial Fold Depth
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Depth of crease below lower lip. Side view helps.

trait_catalog.name: Mandibular Plane Angle
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Angle of lower jaw. Side view required.

trait_catalog.name: Chin Point Prominence
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Forward projection of chin tip. Side view required.

trait_catalog.name: Masseter Definition
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Visibility of jaw muscle. Body comp and lighting affect.

trait_catalog.name: Temporal Hollowing
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Depression in temple area. Lighting sensitive.

trait_catalog.name: Glabellar Region
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Smoothness between brows.

trait_catalog.name: Lateral Eye Lines
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Expression lines at outer eye corners.

trait_catalog.name: Malar Highlight Area
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Natural highlight on upper cheeks. Lighting dependent.

trait_catalog.name: Lower Face Ratio
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Lower face as proportion of total. Ideal 0.30-0.36.

trait_catalog.name: Brow-to-Hairline Distance
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Upper third assessment. Hairline detection unreliable.

trait_catalog.name: Biocular Width
trait_catalog.scoring_guidance: Outer eye corner to outer eye corner width.
